column4: hello, i'm trying to install ATI driver from ATI, but when install fglrx*.deb, it show something like this : module build for the currently running kernel was skipped since the kernel source for this kernel does not seem to be installed
i've install some package for compile : build-essential, ... but it not work
you have to install the kernel sources
only linux-source, package kernel-source not found , that's strange
